CustomField.formula:
IF( Manual_Override__c="TRUE" ||(NOT(ISNULL(Begin_Calling__c)) && Begin_Calling__c>TODAY()) ||(TODAY()- DATEVALUE(Last_Referral_Date__c))>365 ||DoNotCall ||Age__c < 18 ||ISPICKVAL(PhoneLookup__c,"Pending") ||ISPICKVAL( Target__c, "Joyable") ||EC_Reserve__c,
"Not_Callable",
IF(ISPICKVAL(CustomerStatus__c,"New") || ISPICKVAL(CustomerStatus__c,"In_Process") || ISPICKVAL(CustomerStatus__c,"Monitoring_Deductible"), "Callable", "Closed") )
CustomField.label: Callable
